metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000248 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.description:
Redis-store <=v1.3.0 allows unsafe objects to be loaded from redis

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000248` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-redis-store - 1.3.0-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-redis-store package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-3').
